Here I will explore co2 emissions of individual countries

```{r echo=FALSE}
  carbonData <- read.csv('co2-world-data.csv', header=T )
  
  # install.packages("data.table")
  library(data.table)
  oldnames = names(carbonData[3:18])
  newnames = c(1996:2011)
  setnames(carbonData, old = oldnames, new = as.character(newnames))
  carbonData <-carbonData[,!(names(carbonData) %in% c("Country.Code"))]
  
  countryData <- t(carbonData[,-1])
  colnames(countryData) <- carbonData$Country.Name
```

```{r}
  library(ggplot2)
  unitedStates <- carbonData[which(carbonData$Country.Name == "United States"),]
  # ggplot(data = unitedStates, aes(x=newnames, y=unitedStates[3:18])) +
    # geom_point()
  ggplot()
  
```
